description: A windlass tourniquet, intended for stopping hemorrages in battlefield and pre-hospital conditions.  While not easy to use, in an emergency it may save your life.  This commercial model, the Combat Application Tourniquet, is in use with the U.S. Army, owing to its effectiveness.  The strap is currently wide enough for use on an average adult's arm.  Activate to adjust size and location.
